mapper.insert: insert into repaires (repairs_id, dorm_id, room_id, describe, gettime, fixtime, isfixed) values (#{repairsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dormId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gettime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fixtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isfixed,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update repaires set dorm_id = #{dormId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gettime = #{gettime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fixtime = #{fixtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isfixed = #{isfixed,jdbcType=BIT} where repairs_id = #{repairsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select repairs_id, dorm_id, room_id, describe, gettime, fixtime, isfixed from repaires
